title: From Sales to Data Science: My Transition Journey
content: After over a decade in sales and recruiting, I decided to pursue my long-standing curiosity in data. Here's what it took to make the leap, what I learned, and what I'm focused on next.

title: Inside the Patient No-Show Prediction Project
content: This project taught me the importance of class imbalance, feature engineering, and aligning business goals with model metrics. Let's walk through what I built and why it matters.
